net.casper.io.file.def

Class CDataFileDefLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.casper.io.file.def.CDataFileDefLoader

  • public class CDataFileDefLoader
extends Object
    Loads CDataFileDef instances from JSON strings and text files. Can also serialize CDataFileDef instances to JSON strings. Example CDataFileDef JSON string: 
     {
 "name":"Adults",
 "column_names":[
     "updated",
     "sex",
     "weight",
     "age",
     "name",
     "height",
     "children"
 ],
 "column_types":[
     "boolean",
     "character",
     "double",
     "integer",
     "string",
     "optional double",
     "optional integer"
 ],
 "primary_key":[
     "integer"
 ]
 }
    CellReaders are mapped to and from strings using the mappings provided by CellReaders, ie: to/from default cell readers.
    Version:
    $Revision: 190 $
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Method Detail

      • toJsonString

        public String toJsonString(CDataFileDef cdef)
        Serialize a CDataFileDef to a JSON string.
        Parameters:
        cdef - casper data file definition
        Returns:
        a JSON string representing cdef.
        Throws:
        org.omancode.rmt.cellreader.CellReaderException - if cdef has any non default cell readers.

      • fromJsonString

        public CDataFileDef fromJsonString(String jsonString)
        Construct a CDataFileDef from a JSON string.
        Parameters:
        jsonString - string containing JSON text of a CDataFileDef.
        Returns:
        a CDataFileDef deserialized from jsonString.

      • fromJsonFile

        public CDataFileDef fromJsonFile(File jsonFile)
                          throws IOException
        Construct a CDataFileDef from JSON text in a file.
        Parameters:
        jsonFile - file containing JSON text of a CDataFileDef.
        Returns:
        a CDataFileDef deserialized from jsonFile.
        Throws:
        IOException - if invalid JSON string in jsonFile, or problem reading from jsonFile.
